alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Merrick; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 11:32PM CDT until April 22 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Clay County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern York County in east central Nebraska... Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Northwestern Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern Merrick County in central Nebraska... Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1131 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shelton to near Hansen to near Sutton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Doniphan and Saronville around 1135 PM CDT. Sutton around 1140 PM CDT. Stockham around 1150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Alda, Grand Island, Phillips, Henderson, Cairo and Chapman. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 293 and 346. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clay; Fillmore; Hall; Hamilton; Merrick; York
